commandDescription: generates a custom metadata field based on the field type provided
commandLongDescription: Generates a custom metadata field based on the field type provided.
picklistValuesFlagDescription: comma-separated list of picklist values; required for Picklist fields
picklistValuesFlagLongDescription: A comma-separated list of picklist values. These values are required when creating a Picklist field.
decimalplacesFlagDescription: number of decimal places to use for Number or Percent fields
decimalplacesFlagLongDescription: The number of decimal places to use for Number or Percent fields.
labelFlagLongDescription: The label for the new field.
outputDirectoryFlagDescription: directory to store the newly created files
outputDirectoryFlagLongDescription: The directory to store the newly created files. The location can be an absolute path or relative to the current working directory. The default is the current directory.
invalidCustomFieldError: %s is an invalid field. Custom fields can only contain alphanumeric characters, must begin with a letter, cannot end with an underscore or contain two consecutive underscore characters.
picklistValuesNotSuppliedError: Picklist values are required when type is Picklist
invalidDecimalError: %s is an invalid number. Decimal places must be greater than or equal to zero.
